name: justFDI
overview:
justFDI provides bespoke web applications, primarily focusing on solutions for the events industry.

Current projects:

ThinkWall.com applies custom interfaces, branding and design to real-time feeds from Twitter, RSS, SMS and Email to bring audience feedback and participation to events.

SeenLast.com is a location based task tracker. Have tasks submitted to your profile, categorised by a location. On check-in, users receive those tasks. All check-in and task data can be output as iCal.

Previous projects:

JournoTwit.com was a web based Twitter client built with journalists and media professionals in mind. Encouraged users to build columns for specific searches, applying multiple search phrases and blacklisting to find the exact tweets needed for research.

PCMTherapyWatch.com took filtered Twitter searches and allowed users to sort tweets into categories extremely quickly using keyboard shortcuts.

UKTJPR.com was a community portal for UK technology journalists and PRs. Searches returned for community members were sorted into statuses, links and photos.
